name: Epic
description: The Epic connector allows you to access the Epic FHIR APIs through WSO2 Micro Integrator (WSO2 EI). Epic connector currently supports the R4 version of the FHIR standard.

operations.name: create
operations.description: Create a new resource in the Epic FHIR server.

operations.name: getCapabilityStatement
operations.description: Retrieve the CapabilityStatement resource from the Epic system.

operations.name: readById
operations.description: Retrieve a resource by its ID from the Epic system.
